attributes.action: benifits for parents (single and in a couple) in education
attributes.additional_details: Im living with the father of my child and because of this when i start college (sept 14) i cant claim any benefits at all (other than housing benifits, child benifit and child tax credit) which means the whole time in in college we have no income what so ever !!!! So ive made this petition to see if we can get benifits for parents in college who need this money to survive !!!!!
